Articles.Content:
Hello!

I'd like to suggest having a button to extend/retract solar panels on a vessel, like we have on gears and lights. Do you agree?
I keep suggesting this and there's no reply. This is a lot more important than brakes wich screw up your vehicles, or gears that don't function properly.
Not sure how I feel about this, considering two of the five extendable solar panels in the game cannot be retracted.

Can't say I care much, I don't mind removing even gears/lights. Their purpose is having indicator in addition to usual action when non-IVA (because IVA has own lamps), but they don't work correctly quite often - and when external view the status is visible just by looking at ship anyway.

Edited September 12, 2015 by RidingTheFlow
Yes please. Also: Ladders and cargo bays/service compartments.

Yes please. Also: Ladders and cargo bays/service compartments.
Yes, but only if they can be removed from the default, like you can with Landing Gear, Lights and Brakes. Sometimes I use Cargo Bays just as hollow fuselage, that I don't want to open. Either for aesthetics or because the bay doors will clip into other parts and maybe call forth the Kraken.
